#summary Installing the Imp Plugin

= IMP Plugin Installation =

The IMP plugin is in a fully working state where you can install it to your eclipse environment and run it.  It requires Eclipse version 3.7 or higher to run.  To install it:

 #) Run Eclipse
 #) Go to install new Software under the help menu
 #) Click on the Add button
 #) Specify a name for the site
 #) In the url section put in http://impsim.googlecode.com/svn/update_site
 #) Select the imp plugin that appears and click next
 #) Click next past the install details.
 #) Accept the license agreement and click finish
 #) It may pop up a box saying are you sure you want continue to install.  Click ok.
 #) It will ask you to restart you eclipse.  Restart it.
 #) When Eclipse comes back up go Open Perspective under Window
 #) Select other.  When the window pops up click on IMP and Click ok

You are now ready to use IMP!
